    • 方法详细资料

      • execute

        public abstract java.lang.String execute(java.io.File workingDir,
                       java.lang.String stdin)
        Executes the tool with args provided in the constructor
        参数:
        stdin - Input on stdin. NOT THE ARGUMENTS! Can be null.
        返回:
        Output on stdout

      • getStatusCode

        public int getStatusCode()
        After execution returns the status of the tool
        返回:
        Returns 0 if executed properly

      • setStatusCode

        protected void setStatusCode(int statusCode)
        Set the status code during or after execution of the tool
        参数:
        statusCode - 0 if executed normally. Otherwise, see http://tldp.org/LDP/abs/html/exitcodes.html#EXITCODESREF

        protected void statusError()
